title: Plan docs and example coverage
description: List required doc sections and examples aligned with other workstreams: bundled binary/CODEX_HOME, streaming API, MCP/app-server, feature detection. Map each to files and commands.

title: Add/refresh examples
description: Add examples under crates/codex/examples for streaming, CODEX_HOME override, bundled binary selection, MCP codex/codex-reply, app-server thread/turn, feature detection. Ensure they compile and document required env vars.

title: Update README and EXAMPLES guide
description: Document new APIs and examples: binary/CODEX_HOME setup, streaming API usage, MCP/app-server usage, version detection hooks. Link to examples and note safety defaults.

title: Sync crate-level rustdoc with latest APIs
description: Refresh crate-level documentation and inline rustdoc to match new APIs and examples: binary/CODEX_HOME setup, streaming event shapes, log tee + artifacts, MCP/app-server flows, capability detection hooks. Add short inline examples and link back to README/EXAMPLES.

title: QA docs and examples
description: Run doc tests/examples, verify streaming event shapes/log tee/artifact paths, and cross-check MCP/app-server/capability instructions against latest APIs and samples. Patch any drift and note coverage gaps.

title: Docs handoff
description: Finalize docs/examples handoff after QA; align README/rustdoc/EXAMPLES with latest APIs and samples; prep release summary for downstream consumers.

title: Docs backlog sweep
description: Sweep remaining doc/example backlog items: fold in streaming/log-tee/API changes from Workstream D, document apply/resume/apply/diff flows, sync capability hooks/caching guidance with latest codex features list output.
